page.title: 10WEATHER AND ECOLOGY.
page.content: The area is considered locally to have a unique climate as showers often pass by. It is very windy with prevailing West or South West winds. Very occasionally the winds are so salt_laden, leaves of trees are scorched. Although atmospheric pollution from Severn_side industry is visible it is strictly controlled and so its effect on the environ is not very apparent. The Elm trees are recovering after the devastation of Dutch Elm disease. Cowslips flourish on motorway edges. Butterflies are increasing, as are bats. Rabbits have increased greatly this year causing havoc in many gardens.
